channel.title: Help with Item Editing
channel.description:
hey, i used to make servers, but hey, they get boring so now im making a client. In my client im creating my own armours and items with Areo8's Custom Model Maker. But i need to know what colour to make the amour and items. Has anyone got a list of colours and there numbers?
Thank you
th3h1tm4n[br][size=1]Posted on: October 28, 2007, 02:55:07 PM[/size][hr]bump..anyone...rep ++ for anyone who can help

item.title: Help with Item Editing
item.dc:creator: @th3h1tm4n th3h1tm4n
item.description:
@th3h1tm4n wrote:

thank you ill just check to make sure it works :)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 29, 2007, 11:15:13 AM[/size][hr]nope not the right colours… 999999 is a light green in the game but on that list says it a grey…

anyone got a list of colours and textures?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Item Editing
item.dc:creator: @Evan1 Evan`
item.description:
@Evan1 wrote:

Here’s the link to a hex color chart http://www.tbi.univie.ac.at/TBI/hex_color_chart.png
